info.name: Neo Fix by Kira
info.description: Some fixes beginning from 27.08.2015. Install Original Neo Dark theme Thanks to the author for such brilliant dark theme.
info.additionalInfo:
04.10.2015 - Video channel header fixed
14.10.2015 - Profile and video icons fixed(almost:)), add video popup, user page button fixed
14.09.15 - Neo fix: Extended search button color fix; search tools are visible now.(thnx to Assyle Bezpříjmení)
11.09.15 - Show more videos button fixed
09.09.15 - Photo chronic creation year fixed
08.09.15 - Some color fixes
06.09.15 - Cross-browser fixes added; Savefrom.net video links fixed
31.08.15 - Unreaded outgoing messages background corrected
27.08.15 - Snapster messagebox background fixed Unread outgoing messages are with dark-red background now
Earlier - some color fixes in video(background, icons), etc.
